/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top left corner, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. 

On the right side of the street, there's a large white building with a curved roof, standing out against the blue sky. To the left, a smaller gray building with a flat roof can be seen. The buildings are surrounded by lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. 

Power lines stretch across the scene, connecting the buildings and adding a sense of connectivity to the image. On the right side of the street, there's a gas station, indicating the presence of modern infrastructure in this area. 

Overall, the image presents a harmonious blend of urban architecture and natural elements, reflecting the unique character of Beijing.
